title: critical file found etc/passwd on www.reddit.com
content:
1.go to this link https://www.reddit.com/etc%2fpasswd
2.youll find all the etc/passwd files this data should be protected.
3.these passwd can be used for many illegal purpose and can damage the comapny

all the password and data publicly available
steps: Observe the exposed /etc/passwd file contents in the response
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the exposure of the /etc/passwd file on Reddit's web server, which contains sensitive user account information. This file should not be publicly accessible as it can be used for malicious purposes such as brute force attacks or privilege escalation.
reason: The attack is straightforward and does not involve multiple components, complex interactions, or novel logic. It simply requires accessing a specific URL where sensitive information is inadvertently exposed.
